name: enchant
desc: Allows you to enchant items in an enchanting table.
note: You need to first open an enchanting table and then place and item that you want to enchant and lapis in the enchanting table, and then you can execute the command. To open an enchanting table you can use the useblock command.

parameters.name: top
parameters.desc: The top slot in the enchanting table.

parameters.name: middle
parameters.desc: The middle slot in the enchanting table.

parameters.name: bottom
parameters.desc: The bottom slot in the enchanting table.
